ee.guardtime.proov.api

Interface ContainerServiceAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZipContainerServiceImpl

    public interface ContainerServiceAPI
    Container service for storing datafiles and signatures. Should be possible to create container, add new signature. Also should be possible to read existing containers, add and remove signatures from there.
